extensionIdentifier.files.include.description: Glob patterns to include in the package. The default is ts, js, json, html, css, scss, less.

extensionIdentifier.files.exclude.description: Glob patterns to exclude from the package. The default is node_modules, dist, out, build, and any hidden files.

extensionIdentifier.files.showPath.description: Show the path of the file in the name of the list of generated files

extensionIdentifier.openai.apiKey.description: OpenAI API Key. Get it from https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys

extensionIdentifier.openai.model.description: OpenAI Model. The default is gpt-3.5-turbo. Get more information from https://platform.openai.com/docs/models/model-endpoint-compatibility
